name: Dentist doctor simulator games
description:
Be the best dentist at this crazy fun office! Treat patients with professional doctor tools like syringes, dental tweezers, laughing gas and more! Play fun-filled mini games!
This dentist’s office is so much fun!

Features:
• Educational doctor game
• Over 20 dental instruments to use
• Enjoy this playing for FREE
• Great for preschoolers and kids of all ages.
• Colorful and fun graphic.
• Smooth and simple game control.
• Cute dental tools to clean up germs & perform procedures.
• Perform various procedures on various characters.
• Collect stickers for each time you successfully help a character.
• Learn about dental health, tooth brushing, and how to treat patients.
